body:
The dependencies match the requirements on the GitHub repo: https://github.com/clara-parabricks/GenomeWorks
Except CUDA which is bumped to @11, for 2 reasons:
- Cuda <11 can only be compiled with gcc@4.8.5 on RHEL 7, but GenomeWorks requires gcc@5.4.0:
- the provided patch to ignore CUB only works with Cuda@11
title: Add new package: parabricks/GenomeWorks
